mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, GOODS_NUM, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_ECHECK FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, A.MEMBER_NUM, A.GOODS_NUM, A.ORDER_AMOUNT, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAYMENT, A.ORDER_ECHECK, C.MEMBER_ID, C.MEMBER_NAME, D.GOODS_PRICE, D.GOODS_DCPRICE, D.GOODS_SOLDOUT, D.GOODS_AMOUNT FROM ORDERS A, MEMBER C, GOODS D WHERE A.MEMBER_NUM = C.MEMBER_NUM(+) AND A.GOODS_NUM = D.GOODS_NUM AND A.ORDER_PAYMENT IN ('C') ORDER BY ORDER_NUM DESC

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM, A.MEMBER_NUM, A.GOODS_NUM, A.ORDER_AMOUNT, A.ORDER_DATE, A.ORDER_PRICE, A.ORDER_PAYMENT, A.ORDER_ECHECK, C.MEMBER_ID, C.MEMBER_NAME, D.GOODS_PRICE, D.GOODS_DCPRICE, D.GOODS_SOLDOUT, D.GOODS_AMOUNT FROM ORDERS A, MEMBER C, GOODS D WHERE A.MEMBER_NUM = C.MEMBER_NUM(+) AND A.GOODS_NUM = D.GOODS_NUM AND A.ORDER_PAYMENT IN ('C') AND A.ORDER_NUM LIKE '%'||#{isSearch}||'%' ORDER BY ORDER_NUM DESC
